summary: This is an email forwarding a Palm Beach Daily News report about Jeffrey Epstein. The email, sent to then-U.S. Attorney Alex Acosta, notes the speed of the media reporting on the case.

persons.name: Alex Acosta
persons.context: Recipient of an email forwarding a news report about Jeffrey Epstein. He was the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida at the time.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Palm Beach Daily News report that is being forwarded in the email.

connections.description: Acosta, as U.S. Attorney, was the federal prosecutor overseeing the Epstein investigation at the time this email was sent.

events.title: Email forwarding Epstein news report
events.description: An email is sent to U.S. Attorney Alex Acosta containing a Palm Beach Daily News report about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An email regarding Jeffrey Epstein was sent to U.S. Attorney Alex Acosta on July 15, 2008.
The email forwarded a report from the Palm Beach Daily News about Epstein.
The sender's comment 'Wow â€” these guys work fast' suggests the media was quickly reporting on the Epstein case.
This communication shows federal prosecutors were monitoring media coverage of the Epstein investigation in 2008.
